name: Chocolope
description: DNA Genetics developed Chocolope by crossing Chocolate Thai with Cannalope Haze to create their homage to the Chocolate strains of the 1980s. The hefty sativa buds give earthy, sweet coffee flavors that provide a dreamy, cerebral effect. Consumers report a strong, euphoric mental shift that is great when coping with depression or stress.
attributes_title: Happy, Energetic, Uplifted, Euphoric, Creative, Stress, Depression, Fatigue, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Paranoid, Dizzy
